page.description: There are a slew of different and simple ways an editable grid can be configured. The editable grid in this video shows all the possible ways users can edit, including:

case.description: Turning off option to save individual rows
Moving the new record rows to the top of the grid
Keyboard support (F9 to save data, Up and Down to change row with focus, etc.)
Trapping actions that would lose uncommitted data
